snippet.title: Pants Quest - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Available March 1st, wishlist on Steam now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1810610/Pants_Quest/

Pants Quest is a tiny, lovingly crafted point-and-click adventure game about finding your way in life. And your pants. Sometimes just getting dressed and leaving the house feels like an impossible task. Follow one man's emotional journey through a day that only seems to get worse.
